title: Minimum value of a function given its derivative

content.prompt: The derivative of the function f is given by  f ′ ( x )= e −x cos( x 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@446A@ , for all real numbers x. What is the minimum value of f(x) for  −1≤x≤1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CDE@ ?

choices.label: There is no minimum value of f(x) for −1≤x≤1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CDE@ .

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
